testcase.classname: To Verify My Files Tabs Functionality
testcase.name: To Verify the column sorting functioanlity is working in MY Files

testcase.failure:
Given navigate to URL "https://drysign-qa.exela.global/#/"..................passed When enter the user name as "sid39@mailinator.com"..........................passed When enter the password as"Malin@555".......................................passed And user click on the sign in button........................................passed And user click on continue with free version................................passed And user click on My Files..................................................passed Then user display requested by..............................................passed Then user click on upward arrow.............................................passed Then Display ascending order................................................passed Then user click on downward arrow...........................................failed Then Display descending order...............................................skipped
